nodes.text: The Nexus Room was a cantina in the southern quadrant of Kaas City on the planet Dromund Kaas during the Cold War-era of galactic history. The cantina had installed a trio of musician droids known as the Leisurenauts to preform a selection of programmed musical tracks when patrons inputted tokens into the cantina's jukebox. Several millennia after the Sith Empire abandoned Dromund Kaas, an archaeological expedition discovered the remnants of the Nexus Room amid the ruins of Kaas City and found the still functioning droid band.
